text: Ara muminadera sakalera ekasathe abhiyane bera ha'oya sangata naya. Atahpara tadera pratyeka dalera eka ansa kena bera haya na, yate tara dinera gabhira jnana arjana [1] karate pare [2] ebam tadera sampradayake bhitipradarsana karate pare, yakhana tara tadera kache phire asabe [3], yate tara satarka haya
